attributes.action: Stop West Lancs Council selling a very small green space of land in Mercury Way
attributes.additional_details: The council are refusing to listen to any reason and members who have been elected democratically are suddenly not available or do not want to become involved allowing the council time to push this sale through.
attributes.background: West Lancashire Council are offloading small amounts of land in an established private housing estate. These are the closest green area for out children to safely play.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you.
